competition_summary.context: COMPETITION McDonald’s restaurants compete with international, national, regional and local retailers of traditional, fast casual and other food service competitors. The Company competes in the quick-service restaurant industry on the basis of price, convenience, service, experience, menu variety and product quality in a highly fragmented global restaurant industry. In measuring the Company’s competitive position, management reviews data compiled by Euromonitor International, a leading source of
